Comment: Hi everyone, this was a Bury League game, the last game of the 1999 season in which ended on a fairly happy note for me, a draw against a higher rated player.  Have a good read!  Joanne

30. ....................... Qe3  - here Kevin offers me a draw as there seems nothing better than to shunt Henry from h1 to g1.  I accepted it.  Little did I know that that would be the last time I would play in the Bury League.  Little by little I played fewer and fewer matches for my club.  I am still torn as to whether I should start playing in serious OTB chess matches again but feel I have enough on my plate with my correspondence chess.
